name: Monument Grapple
description:
This was a school project for AP Human Geography.

Grapple through 7 levels based on monuments around the world! 

CONTROLS:

  • Left Click/Spacebar to grapple
  • A & D to thrust left and right to gain momentum
  • R to reload the level

Because the game was made for school, it is not extremely high quality, but the mechanics are fun. Try and get the fastest time possible!
